short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: 8D is able to process in real time all audio streams from your browser, and convert them to fully-immersive 8D sound

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
8D is able to process in real time all audio streams from your browser, and convert them to fully-immersive 8D sound.
Just open your favourite multimedia streaming website, press the start button and enjoy!
